name: Retro Kill
description:
Made during the #PAJGameJam for Atomium.

You have to kill enemies, that's all folks ! 

To kill them, you must shoot on their apple.

Movements : WASD 

Shoot :  Left Click

(you have to click and click again to shoot)

music : Overlord ALU - Synthwave (youtube)

alt + F4 to quit the game :P
